snippet: The African Union on Monday gave Burkina Faso’s military leaders two weeks to return power to a civilian-led government or face severe sanctions.
abstract: African Union gives Burkina Faso's military leaders two weeks to return power to civilian-led government or face severe sanctions.
lead_paragraph: The African Union on Monday gave Burkina Faso’s military leaders two weeks to return power to a civilian-led government or face severe sanctions.

keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
